name: Frog Run-rush Jump On Helix
description:
One: the product "frog, fast running" is an independent innovation game. It is an interesting and fun game that is different from the game that does not move.
(1) the core game of the game: a single jump on the left of a single screen, two jumps on the left side of the screen, and a maximum of only two jumps. Then right - click the tongue and pass through
Swallow the tongue and stick the slate to make a jump (notice, the position of the takeoff at different times and the length and length of the tongue at different times.
All of them affect the distance of the jump.
(2) the game is divided into an endless mode and a barrier mode, and the level of the card is carefully designed and each pass is a different experience.
For example, some of the slates are moving like a seesaw, and there are some obstacles to the road, and the mosquitoes, and you have to do your best to eat it.
These insects, so that their weight completely becomes heavier, so you can stick your tongue out when the stone road thrown farther and more fun skills on the inside, or
You will think this game is very simple, but when you play, you will think the game is simple and not simple, and you will slowly attract the game, even sometimes.
Sometimes I doubt your mind and hands. Sometimes, you can't make the right judgement in a short time. It brings players a kind of stimulation, fun and mental exercise.
Fun and good games!
